```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(billboard)
```

```{r}
x <- wiki_hot_100s |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  mutate(year = parse_number(year))
#fixed year, made it a number 
x
#put this here to view the tibble
```

```{r}
x |> 
  group_by(year) |>
  distinct(artist) |>
  summarize(distinct_artists=n())
  
```
